casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Ryan Gabriel GARCELL. No. 465A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 24, 2008. Thomas Maher, for Ryan Gabriel Garcell. Charlie C. Walker, Asheville, for State of NC. William Hart, Senior Deputy Attorney General, Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Jeff Hunt, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th day of December 2007 by Defendant to Amend Record on Appeal:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 24th day of January 2008."
